channel.title: Skillcapes on devolution
channel.description: Well i am haveing a small problem.I have the dodian/devolution source And I have fixed it to where when u wear the skillcape it goes in the right place BUT!!!!!Im trying to make it give you a skillcape when ever you get 99 in that skill can any one help me.Also im not a noob at codeing so what ever you tell me to do if it involves codeing it should be easy. :|
